summary: The document is a cover sheet from the 13th Intelligence Corps Group in Chicago, Illinois, related to an investigation into David Reed Fromer. It includes agency information, document details, and a brief description of an exhibit, which is a letter from the Federal Bureau of Investigation dated 9 February 1967 regarding the subject. The document is unclassified but was released with deletions and has a restriction level of 3.
key_findings: The document pertains to an investigation by INSCOM/CSF into David Reed Fromer, with a record number 194-10004-10149.
It is part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations records series.
The exhibit described is a letter from the FBI regarding Fromer, indicating federal interest in the subject.
The document's classification is unclassified, but it was released with deletions, suggesting some information was withheld.
The document was last reviewed on 03/07/95 and has a restriction level of 3, indicating controlled access.
